tweet.content: #MakeBaseballExciting @nerdist The hitter carries the bat around the bases
Players must make it to first, second, and third bases...with a fan. #MakeBaseballExciting
Put the umpire behind the pitcher instead of behind the catcher #MakeBaseballExciting
Force members of losing team to fight to the death ala The Hunger Games. #MakeBaseballExciting
#MakeBaseballExciting Turning on the Bat Signal When Coach wants a Reliever.
Cats and laser pointers. Look what it has done for the interwebs. #MakeBaseballExciting
Have Tom Brady play and watch him try to figure out how to deflate baseballs #MakeBaseballExciting
Play all games on real "grass", if you know what I mean. #MakeBaseballExciting
The pitcher throws grenades instead of baseball's #MakeBaseballExciting #PointsMe @nerdist
Bruce Springsteen plays a free concert at every game #MakeBaseballExciting
If ball hits a player, they get to pic out a stuffed animal prize #MakeBaseballExciting
The ball is now a pinyatta #MakeBaseballExciting
1 in 50 balls has a soft nougat filling. 1 in 1000 explode. #MakeBaseballExciting
#MakeBaseballExciting Peregrine Falcons may catch pop ups @EmbryEthan @BrandonJohnsn @eliroth
Bats replaced by lightsabers #MakeBaseballExciting
Have the team's dancers dance in lingerie. #MakeBaseballExciting
Crowd vote rather than instant replay #MakeBaseballExciting
Water balloon fights #MakeBaseballExciting
@hardwick #MakeBaseballExciting every strike out calls far a mound charge and ninja fight breaks out.
#MakeBaseballExciting Wives play on Wednesdays
Let Wendy Williams pitch one game for the entire league #MakeBaseballExciting
If a player gets a golden sombrero, then all players get to give him a golden shower #MakeBaseballExciting
Replace the baseball bats with actual bats. #MakeBaseballExciting #pointsme
A sacrifice fly includes a real human sacrifice #MakeBaseballExciting
